name: Chickasha Wings, Inc.
about: Chickasha Wings, Inc., founded in 2003 by Mitchell Williams, is a premier flight school located at the Chickasha Municipal Airport in Oklahoma. Dedicated to providing safe, efficient, and affordable flight training, the school offers all levels of instruction, from private pilot certifications to multi-engine training. With a diverse fleet including Cessna 150s, Cessna 172s, Piper Cherokee, Piper Apache, and an Ercoupe-LSA, students have various aircraft options for their training. The school is supported by experienced instructors, including Mitch Williams, who is also an A&P mechanic and IA mechanic. Chickasha Wings also features a full-time repair shop and ground school sessions every Tuesday night. Their commitment to nurturing the passion for aviation in a supportive environment makes them an ideal choice for aspiring pilots. Contact us to start your aviation journey today.
